charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was training
under Alder in a Pokémon battle, after Alder
had awakened his arc suit...
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_0200_:
Impressive, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’ve gotten much stronger since we last
battled!
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_0300_:
Keep working hard, and I’m sure you’ll get
stronger still.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_0400_:
When you do, be sure to show me how
much you’ve grown again!
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_0500_: It’s exciting watching young talent grow.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_0600_:
But I have to be careful I’m not overtaken
by people like you, who get stronger
every day!
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0301_0700_:
I have a long way to go to reach
your level.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0401_0800_:
Don’t you think a bigger goal will fuel
your fire?
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0302_0900_:
How much stronger do you plan
to get?
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0402_1100_:
But don’t you think a journey to the unknown
is the most exciting kind?
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_1300_:
But every now and then, I look back at the
paths I’ve taken.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_1500_:
From winding trails to straight roads,
steep climbs to gentle slopes...
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_1600_:
On those paths, I’ve experienced moments
both happy and sad.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_1700_:
But every step and everything I’ve learned
has led me to this moment.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_1800_:
That includes the paths I’ve walked with
Volcarona, who stands by my side...
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_1900_:
and the journeys I shared with my old
partner, who now rests in Celestial Tower.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_2000_:
Every life experience has shaped me into
who I am today.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0401_2200_: Well, pretty much the same as before.
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0302_2300_:
What are you going to do with your
new power?
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_0402_2400_: I didn’t see that question coming!
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_2500_: With the power of my arc suit...
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_2600_:
I plan to tell people about how wonderful it
is to walk toward the future together with
Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_2700_:
No matter how far I go, my core beliefs
won’t change!
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_2800_:
With my partner, I plan to shine so bright,
our light will reach Celestial Tower...
charaepi_ch0132_90_adeku/2301_1201_2900_:
and illuminate the future for both people
and Pokémon!
